sentence.Network_en: I think I've been very selfish. I've been mainly concerned with myself.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得我一直非常自私。总是只关心自己。

sentence.Network_en: Susan and Deborah share an intensely selfish, egotistic streak.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏珊和德博拉两个人都极端自私和自我。

sentence.Network_en: She calls me lazy and selfish.

entry.def: If you say that someone is selfish, you mean that he or she cares only about himself or herself, and not about other people.

example.ex: I think I've been very selfish. I've been mainly concerned with myself.
example.tran: 我觉得我一直非常自私。总是只关心自己。

example.ex: ...the selfish interests of a few people.

means.word_mean: 1. concerned chiefly or only with yourself;

sentences.sentence: "Selfish men were...trying to make capital for themselves out of the sacred cause of civil rights"- Maria Weston Chapman

auth_sentence.content: I was still the selfish bastard I always was.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"像……一样,有……的",通常放在具体的名词后; 2. 表动词,"造成……,成……"

stems_affixes.word_buile: slug懒汉+ish像……一样,有……的→sluggish→行动迟钝的,缓慢的
book书+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.书呆子的
boor粗野的人,不懂礼貌的人+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.粗野的
child孩子+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.孩子的;幼稚的
churl粗野的人,吝啬鬼+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.脾气暴躁的
cold冷+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.微冷的
colt小马,无经验的年轻人+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.放浪不拘的,似小马的
fadd时尚+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.流行一时的,时尚的
fat非,胖+ish像……一样,有……的→fattish略胖的
fiend魔鬼+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.极凶恶的
fool愚人,白痴+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.愚笨的,愚蠢的
mode时尚+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.时髦的
self自己+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.自私的
snob势利的人,假内行+ish像……一样,有……的→snobbish势利的,谄上欺下的
wag摇摆,小丑+ish像……一样,有……的→waggish→诙谐的,滑稽的
yellow黄+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.微黄色的
pol擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,擦亮;使优美,润饰 n.擦光剂,上光蜡
di分开+mini小+ish造成……,成……→变小,减少
em进入+bell美好+ish造成……,成……→进入美好→装饰
fam饿+ish造成……,成……→v.使饥饿
flour花+ish造成……,成……→v.繁荣,茂盛;挥舞
furb擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,刷新
im进入+pover贫困+ish造成……,成……→v.使成赤贫
pol擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,擦亮;使优美,润饰 n.擦光剂,上光蜡
vanqu克服+ish造成……,成……→v.征服,击溃

sentences.cn: 她是一个自私自利的人。

sentences.en: You must learn to share and not be so selfish.
sentences.cn: 你一定要学会与他人分享, 不要那么自私。

sentences.en: He's too selfish to think of lending me his car.
sentences.cn: 他是一个自私的人, 不想把汽车借给我。

jushi.chinese: 她是一个自私自利的人。

jushi.english: You must learn to share and not be so selfish.
jushi.chinese: 你一定要学会与他人分享,不要那么自私。

jushi.english: Oh, don't be so selfish with your money!
jushi.chinese: 好啦,在钱上别这么自私啦!
